ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.1_0: if he has sexual intercourse with the four offenses, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.2_0: he commits two offenses entailing expulsion in regard to a distribution of food:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:1.3_0: they may be failure in morality ...
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.1_0: If a monk, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits, he commits an offense entailing suspension.
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:2.2_0: If, out of disrespect, defecates, urinates, or spits in water, they commit one offense entailing suspension:
ai-pli-tv-pvr1.3:3.1_0: The third sub-chapter on failures is finished.
